ground_truth: The tables are spread with a banquet of mouthwatering food, cakes, sweets, pies, and shiny red apples. Harry looks at the empty chair beside him. Suddenly, Professor Quirrell bursts into the hall. Professor Dumbledore gets to his feet. Quirrell faints. As the students follow quickly into the Hall, Snape disappears through a side door. Harry and Ron run back down the long stone corridor towards the girls' bathroom. They hide as they see a monstrous shadow ahead of them. The troll is dragging a heavy club. Wiping her eyes, Hermione comes out of the toilet. She sees two green legs as thick as great tree trunks. Terrified, she stares up with horror at the troll's lumpy, green body blocking the doorway. Its horrible head, which looks like a squashed, green potato, is almost touching the high ceiling. Raising the club, the troll moves ominously towards her. Hermione locks herself in a toilet. The troll swings the club and smashes it along the row of cubicles. The flimsy partitions fall on top of Hermione. The boys burst into the bathroom. As more cubicles are smashed to smithereens, they throw broken pieces of wood at the troll. Ron hurls a length of metal pipe. Hermione hides under a row of wash basins. Terrified, she cowers against the pipes as the troll smashes a sink off the wall. Harry pulls out his wand. He grabs the swinging club and scrambles up onto the troll's back. He tries to shake him off. Harry hangs on with one hand. But before he can use his wand, he accidentally rams it up the troll's nostril. The angry troll holds Harry upside down, swinging him from side to side. Ron takes out his wand. The troll's club flies up into the air and hovers. Then, it falls and hits the troll hard on its ugly, green head. The troll drops Harry. He scuttles out of the way, as the troll reels dizzily around then crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust settles, Hermione creeps out from under the row of sinks. Water sprays out of a shattered pipe. She looks at the troll nervously. Harry pulls his wand out of the troll's nostril. He wipes it on his cloak. Ron smiles at Harry. Quirrell steps forward. He jumps as the troll gives a snot. At breakfast, Snape appears. Harry notices that Snape is limping. Harry's snowy owl flies into the great hall skimming over their heads. It drops a long thin parcel. Harry catches it. They unwrap the brown paper, to reveal a streamline broomstick with a highly polished handle. Stroking the white owl's feathers, Professor McGonagall smiles at Harry. Wearing leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks, the Gryffindor Quidditch team assemble in the player's tunnel.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The tables are spread with a feast of delectable cuisine, pastries, confections, tarts, and gleaming crimson apples. Harry gazes at the vacant seat beside him. Suddenly, Professor Quirrell bursts into the chamber. Professor Dumbledore rises to his feet. Quirrell collapses. As the pupils follow quickly into the Hall, Snape vanishes through a side entrance. Harry and Ron sprint back down the lengthy stone passageway towards the girls' lavatory. They conceal themselves as they observe an enormous silhouette ahead of them. The troll is hauling a hefty club. Wiping her eyes, Hermione emerges from the restroom. She sees two verdant legs as thick as immense tree trunks. Alarmed, she gazes up with dread at the troll's misshapen, green torso obstructing the doorway. Its dreadful cranium, which resembles a flattened, green tuber, is nearly touching the lofty ceiling. Raising the club, the troll advances menacingly towards her. Hermione locks herself in a lavatory. The troll swings the club and shatters it along the row of stalls. The frail partitions collapse on top of Hermione. The boys rush into the lavatory. As more stalls are shattered to fragments, they hurl broken fragments of wood at the troll. Ron flings a length of metal pipe. Hermione conceals herself under a row of washbasins. Alarmed, she cowers against the pipes as the troll shatters a basin off the wall. Harry extracts his wand. He seizes the swinging club and scrambles up onto the troll's back. He attempts to shake him off. Harry clings on with one hand. But before he can use his wand, he inadvertently rams it up the troll's nostril. The enraged troll holds Harry upside down, swinging him from side to side. Ron removes his wand. The troll's club soars up into the atmosphere and hovers. Then, it descends and strikes the troll forcefully on its hideous, green cranium. The troll releases Harry. He scuttles out of the way, as the troll reels giddily around then crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust settles, Hermione creeps out from under the row of basins. Water sprays out of a shattered pipe. She gazes at the troll apprehensively. Harry extracts his wand from the troll's nostril. He wipes it on his robe. Ron grins at Harry. Quirrell steps forward. He jumps as the troll gives a sneeze. At breakfast, Snape emerges. Harry observes that Snape is limping. Harry's snowy owl glides into the grand chamber skimming over their heads. It drops a long slender package. Harry catches it. They unwrap the brown paper, to reveal a streamlined broomstick with a highly polished handle. Stroking the white owl's feathers, Professor McGonagall grins at Harry. Wearing leather gauntlets and scarlet and gold robes, the Gryffindor Quidditch squad assemble in the player's tunnel.

The club is raised ominously by the troll towards her. A toilet is locked by Hermione. The club is swung by the troll, and the row of cubicles is smashed along. Harry pulls out his wand. The swinging club is grabbed by him, and he scrambles up onto the troll's back. He is tried to be shaken off by the troll. Harry hangs on with one hand. But before his wand can be used, it is accidentally rammed up the troll's nostril by him. Harry is held upside down by the angry troll, swinging him from side to side. Ron takes out his wand. Up into the air, the troll's club flies and hovers. Then, it is made to fall and hit the troll hard on its ugly, green head by him. Harry is dropped by the troll. The way is scuttled out of by him, as the troll is reeled dizzily around then crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust settles, Hermione is crept out from under the row of sinks. Quirrell steps forward. As the troll gives a snot, he jumps. At breakfast, Snape appears. Snape limping is noticed by Harry. Into the great hall, Harry's snowy owl flies, skimming over their heads. A long thin parcel is dropped by it. It is caught by Harry. The brown paper is unwrapped by them, to reveal a streamline broomstick with a highly polished handle. Harry is smiled at by Professor McGonagall while she strokes the white owl's feathers. Wearing leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks, the Gryffindor Quidditch team assembles in the player's tunnel.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: The tables are laden with a feast of delectable food, cakes, sweets, pies, and shiny red apples. Harry notices the empty seat beside him. Abruptly, Professor Quirrell bursts in and faints as Professor Dumbledore stands. As students rush into the Hall, Snape sneaks out a side door. Harry and Ron dash down the stone corridor to the girls' bathroom, hiding from a monstrous shadow. The troll drags a heavy club. Hermione exits the toilet, seeing two green legs thick as tree trunks. Horrified, she stares at the troll's lumpy body blocking the door. Its head, like a squashed potato, nearly touches the ceiling. With a raised club, the troll approaches ominously. Hermione locks herself in a stall as the club smashes the cubicles, collapsing the partitions onto her. The boys burst in, throwing wood pieces at the troll. Ron hurls a metal pipe. Hermione hides under wash basins, terrified as the troll wrecks a sink. Harry uses his wand, climbs the troll's back, and accidentally rams it up its nostril. The troll swings Harry around until Ron casts a spell, causing the club to hit the troll's head. Dropping Harry, the troll collapses. As dust settles, Hermione emerges, nervous. Harry retrieves his wand and cleans it. Ron smiles at him. Quirrell jumps at the troll's snort. At breakfast, Snape appears, limping. Harry's snowy owl flies over, dropping a package. He catches and unwraps it, revealing a sleek broomstick. Professor McGonagall smiles at Harry, who strokes the owl's feathers. The Gryffindor Quidditch team gathers in the tunnel, wearing leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Tables are laden with mouthwatering food, cakes, sweets, pies, and shiny red apples. Harry eyes the empty chair beside him. Professor Quirrell suddenly bursts in, faints, and Dumbledore stands. Students quickly enter the Hall as Snape exits through a side door. Harry and Ron dash down the corridor towards the girls' bathroom, hiding from a monstrous shadow—the troll, dragging a club. Hermione, wiping her eyes, sees the troll's thick legs and horrifying body blocking the doorway. Terrified, she locks herself in and the troll smashes cubicles. The boys enter, throwing wood pieces. Ron hurls a metal pipe as Hermione hides under sinks. Harry climbs the troll, accidentally ramming his wand into its nostril. The troll swings Harry, and Ron uses his wand to make the club hit the troll's head, dropping Harry. The troll crashes to the ground; Hermione emerges as water sprays from pipes. Harry retrieves his wand and Ron smiles. Quirrell nervously steps forward. At breakfast, Snape appears limping as Harry's owl delivers a long parcel. Harry unwraps a polished broomstick. Professor McGonagall smiles, and the Gryffindor Quidditch team assembles, clad in leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: The long tables are generously spread with a sumptuous banquet, overflowing with mouthwatering food that includes a delightful array of cakes, sweet treats, luscious pies, and shiny red apples that gleam invitingly. Harry glances to his side at the empty chair beside him and can't help but notice its vacancy. Suddenly and without any warning, Professor Quirrell bursts dramatically into the grand hall, creating a sudden flurry of excitement. Professor Dumbledore immediately rises to his feet, clearly concerned. In a moment of tension, Quirrell collapses, fainting on the spot. As the students quickly follow and stream into the Hall, Snape discreetly disappears, slipping through a side door without drawing attention. Meanwhile, Harry and Ron hastily run back down the long, echoing stone corridor, heading towards the girls' bathroom. They quickly hide themselves as they catch sight of an ominous, monstrous shadow looming ahead of them. The formidable troll is dragging behind it a heavy club. Wiping tears from her eyes, Hermione emerges from the toilet, unsuspecting of the danger. Her eyes widen in terror as she sees two massive green legs as thick as great tree trunks. Overwhelmed by fear, she stares up at the grotesque troll, its lumpy green body ominously blocking the doorway. The horrible head of the troll, akin to a squashed, green potato, seems almost to graze the high ceiling above. With a menacingly raised club, the troll advances ominously towards her. In a panic, Hermione locks herself within the confines of a toilet cubicle. The troll swings its mighty club with force, smashing it destructively along the row of cubicles. The flimsy partitions crash down, collapsing on top of Hermione. Just then, the boys burst into the chaos of the bathroom. As even more cubicles are reduced to smithereens, they urgently throw broken pieces of wood at the menacing troll. Ron, thinking quickly, hurls a length of metal pipe with determination. Hermione, in a state of panic, hides under a row of wash basins, cowering against the pipes while the troll wreaks havoc, smashing a sink clean off the wall. With resolve, Harry pulls out his wand, then boldly grabs the swinging club and scrambles onto the troll's back. The creature tries to shake him off violently. Hanging on with one hand, Harry inadvertently rams his wand up the troll's nostril before he can make use of it. The enraged troll grabs hold of Harry, swinging him upside down from side to side. Seeing the opportunity, Ron takes out his wand and causes the troll's club to fly up into the air where it hovers momentarily. Then, it descends and hits the troll forcefully on its ugly, green head. The troll releases its grip, dropping Harry. He scuttles swiftly out of harm's way as the troll reels, spins dizzily around, and finally crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust begins to settle, Hermione emerges cautiously from under the row of sinks, nervously glancing at the motionless troll. Water sprays out dramatically from a shattered pipe, creating a chaotic scene. Harry, with determination, pulls his wand free from the troll's nostril and wipes it clean on his cloak. Ron, having regained composure, smiles at Harry, who is relieved. Quirrell steps forward, startled as the troll emits a final snot. Later at breakfast, Snape makes an appearance, noticeable because Harry observes that Snape is now limping. Harry's snowy owl makes a grand entrance into the great hall, skimming gracefully over their heads. It drops a long, thin parcel directly into Harry's waiting hands. As they unwrap the plain brown paper, it reveals a sleek, streamlined broomstick with a highly polished handle. Professor McGonagall, her expression softening, smiles at Harry as she gently strokes the snowy owl's feathers. Clad in their leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks, the Gryffindor Quidditch team eagerly assembles in the players' tunnel, ready for action.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: The long, expansive tables are generously spread with an extravagant and sumptuous banquet, overflowing with an array of mouthwatering food that presents a delightful assortment. This feast includes a tempting variety of cakes, an abundance of sweet treats, luscious pies bursting with flavor, and shiny red apples that gleam invitingly under the soft lighting. Harry glances to his side at the empty chair beside him, and he can't help but notice its stark vacancy. Suddenly, as if summoned by some unknown force and without any prior warning, Professor Quirrell bursts dramatically into the grand hall, creating an unexpected flurry of excitement and chatter among the onlookers. Instantly, Professor Dumbledore rises to his feet, his demeanor clearly reflecting concern. In a tense moment filled with anticipation, Quirrell collapses, fainting right there on the spot. As the students quickly follow suit and stream into the Hall, Snape discreetly vanishes, slipping through a side door with such subtlety that it draws no attention. Meanwhile, Harry and Ron hurriedly run back down the long, echoing stone corridor, making their way towards the girls' bathroom. They swiftly conceal themselves when they catch sight of a menacing, monstrous shadow looming ominously ahead of them. The formidable troll is dragging behind it a heavy club that scrapes along the stone floor. As she wipes tears from her eyes, Hermione emerges from the toilet, completely unsuspecting of the lurking danger. Her eyes widen in terror when she sees the two massive green legs, as thick and solid as great tree trunks. Overwhelmed by fear, she finds herself staring up at the grotesque troll, its lumpy green body ominously blocking the doorway. The horrible head of the troll, resembling a squashed, green potato, seems as though it might almost graze the high ceiling above. With a menacingly raised club, the troll advances ominously towards her. In a panic, Hermione locks herself within the confines of a toilet cubicle, seeking refuge. The troll swings its mighty club with great force, smashing it destructively along the row of cubicles. The flimsy partitions crash down, collapsing with a loud clatter on top of Hermione. Just then, the boys burst into the chaos of the bathroom. As even more cubicles are reduced to smithereens, they urgently throw broken pieces of wood at the menacing troll, trying to distract it. Ron, thinking quickly and with determination, hurls a length of metal pipe. Hermione, panicking, hides under a row of wash basins, cowering against the pipes as the troll wreaks havoc, smashing a sink clean off the wall. With resolve, Harry pulls out his wand, then boldly grabs the swinging club and scrambles onto the troll's back. The creature thrashes, trying to shake him off violently. Hanging on with one hand, Harry inadvertently rams his wand up the troll's nostril before he can make use of it properly. The enraged troll grabs hold of Harry, swinging him upside down from side to side in a wild attempt to dislodge him. Seeing the opportunity, Ron takes out his wand and causes the troll's club to fly up into the air, where it hovers momentarily. Then, it descends and hits the troll forcefully on its ugly, green head. The troll releases its grip, dropping Harry. He scuttles swiftly out of harm's way as the troll reels, spins dizzily around, and finally crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust begins to settle, Hermione emerges cautiously from under the row of sinks, nervously glancing at the motionless troll. Water sprays out dramatically from a shattered pipe, adding to the chaotic scene. Harry, with determination, pulls his wand free from the troll's nostril and wipes it clean on his cloak. Ron, having regained his composure, smiles at Harry, who is visibly relieved. Quirrell steps forward, visibly startled as the troll emits a final snot. Later at breakfast, Snape makes an appearance that is particularly noticeable because Harry observes that Snape is now limping. Harry's snowy owl makes a grand entrance into the great hall, skimming gracefully over their heads. It drops a long, thin parcel directly into Harry's waiting hands. As they unwrap the plain brown paper, it reveals itself to be a sleek, streamlined broomstick with a highly polished handle. Professor McGonagall, her expression softening, smiles warmly at Harry as she gently strokes the snowy owl's feathers. Clad in their leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks, the Gryffindor Quidditch team eagerly assembles in the players' tunnel, ready and waiting for action.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The tables are lavishly spread with a variety of mouthwatering foods, including an assortment of delectable cakes, sweets, savory pies, and shiny red apples, tantalizingly laid out for the feast. Harry sits at the table and gazes at the empty chair next to him, pondering the absence. The tranquil atmosphere is suddenly disrupted as Professor Quirrell bursts dramatically into the hall, causing a stir among those present. In response, Professor Dumbledore rises quickly from his seat, his expressions shifting to concern, as Quirrell suddenly faints, collapsing onto the floor. The students, alerted and startled by the commotion, quickly begin to file into the Hall, observing the spectacle, while Snape, with a look of preoccupation, slips unnoticed through a side door. As a sense of urgency fills the air, Harry and Ron sprint down the long, echoing stone corridor, aiming for the girls' bathroom. While running, they abruptly halt and find a place to hide as they notice a massive, monstrous shadow looming ahead of them. The troll, an enormous, intimidating creature, is laboriously dragging a heavy club along with it. Just then, Hermione emerges from the toilet, wiping her eyes, only to be confronted by the terrifying sight of two green legs as thick as great tree trunks blocking her path. Her eyes widen in horror as she stares at the troll's lumpy, green body that obstructs the doorway completely, with its grotesque head resembling a squashed, green potato, nearly brushing against the high ceiling. The troll ominously raises its formidable club and advances menacingly towards Hermione. In a panic-stricken move, Hermione quickly locks herself inside a toilet cubicle for safety. However, the troll swings its club viciously, smashing it along the row of cubicles, causing the flimsy partitions to collapse and fall upon Hermione. At this critical moment, Harry and Ron burst into the bathroom, their minds racing for a solution. Amidst the chaos, as more cubicles are demolished to smithereens, they gather broken pieces of wood and start hurling them at the troll in a desperate attempt to distract it. Ron, determined to help, finds a length of metal pipe and hurls it with all his might. Meanwhile, Hermione has furtively hidden under a row of wash basins, trembling with fear as she cowers against the pipes while the troll wrecks havoc, smashing a sink violently off the wall. Harry, calculating his next move, pulls out his wand but quickly changes his plan when he sees an opportunity to grab the swinging club. In a daring maneuver, he scrambles courageously onto the troll's back. The troll, bewildered and enraged, tries to dislodge him, shaking vigorously. Harry holds on with one hand as tightly as he can, but before he can use his wand properly, it accidentally plunges up the troll's nostril, adding to its fury. The troll roars in anger, grabbing Harry and holding him upside down, swaying him from side to side like a ragdoll. Observing the precarious situation, Ron draws out his wand decisively, concentrating hard, and in an unexpected turn of events, the troll's club suddenly flies up into the air, then crashes back down, hitting the troll squarely on its ugly, green head with a heavy thud. Momentarily stunned, the troll loosens its grip, dropping Harry, who quickly scuttles out of harm's way. As the troll, dazed and off balance, reels dizzily around, it finally crashes heavily to the ground, causing the floor to tremble. As the dust begins to settle, Hermione carefully creeps out from under the row of sinks, eyes filled with anxiety, water spraying out from a shattered pipe nearby. She nervously examines the fallen troll, assessing if it poses any further danger. Meanwhile, Harry retrieves his wand, grimacing slightly as he pulls it out from the troll's nostril, and then wipes it clean on his cloak. A sense of relief washes over the group, and Ron, feeling the tension lift, smiles at Harry appreciatively. Professor Quirrell, previously passive, steps forward, but involuntarily jumps as the troll makes an unexpected snot. The scene then shifts to the Great Hall during breakfast, where Snape appears once more, this time displaying a noticeable limp as he walks, catching Harry's attention. Amidst this morning routine, Harry's snowy owl majestically flies into the hall, gracefully skimming over the heads of those seated. With precise timing, it releases a long thin parcel that descends towards Harry, who adeptly catches it. As excitement sparkles in the air, he and his friends eagerly unwrap the brown paper, revealing with delight a streamlined broomstick, its handle gleaming with a highly polished finish. Professor McGonagall watches from nearby, her face breaking into a soft smile as she strokes the white owl's feathers, acknowledging the gesture with pride. Meanwhile, the Gryffindor Quidditch team, meticulously prepared for their game, gathers in the player's tunnel, each member wearing leather gloves and cloaks of vibrant scarlet and gold, ready to take on their next challenge.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: The tables are laden with a banquet of mouthwatering food, cakes, sweets, pies, and shiny red apples. Harry notices the empty chair beside him when suddenly, Professor Quirrell bursts into the hall, causing Professor Dumbledore to rise as Quirrell faints. As students follow into the Hall, Snape slips through a side door. Harry and Ron dash down the stone corridor toward the girls' bathroom, hiding upon spotting a monstrous shadow ahead. The troll, dragging a heavy club, approaches, while Hermione, wiping her eyes, exits the toilet and freezes in horror at the troll's massive form blocking the doorway. As it raises the club, Hermione locks herself in a cubicle, and the troll smashes the row of partitions, burying her beneath. The boys burst in, throwing broken wood and metal pipes at the advancing troll. Hermione cowers under the sinks as the troll demolishes a sink. Harry pulls out his wand, scrambles onto the troll's back, and accidentally rams his wand up the troll's nostril, causing it to swing him upside down. Ron casts a spell that sends the troll’s club into the air, and it crashes down, knocking the troll out. Harry drops to safety as the troll collapses. As the dust settles, Hermione emerges from under the sinks, nervously eyeing the unconscious troll. Harry retrieves his wand from its nostril and wipes it clean, while Ron smiles at him. Quirrell enters, startled by the troll's snort. At breakfast, Snape reappears limping, catching Harry's notice. Harry's snowy owl delivers a long thin parcel, revealing a streamlined broomstick. Professor McGonagall smiles at Harry as she strokes the owl's feathers. Meanwhile, the Gryffindor Quidditch team assembles in the player's tunnel, donned in leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The tables are spread with a banquet of mouthwatering food, cakes, sweets, pies, and shiny red apples, reminiscent of those traditionally associated with autumn festivities and known for their crisp sweetness. Harry looks at the empty chair beside him, aware of the significance of this occasion marking the start of a new school year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Suddenly, Professor Quirrell bursts into the hall, his turban askew, a sartorial detail that hides a sinister secret later revealed. Professor Dumbledore, the revered headmaster known for his wisdom and eccentricity, gets to his feet. Quirrell faints, a dramatic reaction due to his underlying fear of the dark force he serves. As the students follow quickly into the Hall, Snape, the enigmatic Potions Master with a questionable past, disappears through a side door. Harry and Ron run back down the long stone corridor towards the girls' bathroom, a place notorious for being haunted by Moaning Myrtle, a ghost. They hide as they see a monstrous shadow ahead of them. The troll, a creature of immense strength but little intelligence, is dragging a heavy club. Wiping her eyes, Hermione comes out of the toilet. She sees two green legs as thick as great tree trunks, which make the creature appear even more formidable. Terrified, she stares up with horror at the troll's lumpy, green body blocking the doorway. Its horrible head, which looks like a squashed, green potato, is almost touching the high ceiling designed to accommodate the grandeur of Hogwarts architecture. Raising the club, the troll moves ominously towards her. Hermione locks herself in a toilet, one of the few places she believes may offer some protection. The troll swings the club and smashes it along the row of cubicles. The flimsy partitions fall on top of Hermione. The boys burst into the bathroom, determined to save their friend. As more cubicles are smashed to smithereens, they throw broken pieces of wood at the troll. Ron hurls a length of metal pipe, a makeshift weapon in their desperate attempt to fend it off. Hermione hides under a row of wash basins. Terrified, she cowers against the pipes as the troll smashes a sink off the wall, flooding the floor with cold water. Harry pulls out his wand, a tool essential for any young wizard at Hogwarts. He grabs the swinging club and scrambles up onto the troll's back, desperately trying to outmaneuver it. He tries to shake him off. Harry hangs on with one hand, but before he can use his wand, he accidentally rams it up the troll's nostril, a move that was not part of any spell he had learned. The angry troll holds Harry upside down, swinging him from side to side. Ron takes out his own wand, his only hope lying in the spells he's been taught, and the troll's club flies up into the air and hovers. Then, it falls and hits the troll hard on its ugly, green head. The troll drops Harry. He scuttles out of the way, as the troll reels dizzily around then crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust settles, Hermione creeps out from under the row of sinks. Water sprays out of a shattered pipe, adding to the chaos of the scene. She looks at the troll nervously. Harry pulls his wand out of the troll's nostril. He wipes it on his cloak, the traditional Hogwarts attire. Ron smiles at Harry, relieved and impressed. Quirrell steps forward, his face pale. He jumps as the troll gives a snot, an involuntary reaction caused by the disturbance. At breakfast, Snape appears. Harry notices that Snape is limping, a mysterious injury whose cause he speculates on. Harry's snowy owl, Hedwig, flies into the great hall skimming over their heads. It drops a long thin parcel, a delivery system for important messages and items among the wizarding community. Harry catches it. They unwrap the brown paper, to reveal a streamline broomstick with a highly polished handle, a Nimbus 2000, known to be one of the fastest models in the wizarding world. Stroking the white owl's feathers, Professor McGonagall smiles at Harry, acknowledging his growing talent and potential. Wearing leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks, the Gryffindor Quidditch team assemble in the player's tunnel, ready to represent their house in the most popular sport in the wizarding world.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: The tables are spread with a banquet of mouthwatering food cakes sweets pies and shiny red apples. Harry looks at the empty chair beside him. Suddenly Professor Quirrell bursts into the hall. Professor Dumbledore gets to his feet. Quirrell faints. As the students follow quickly into the Hall. Snape disappears through a side door. Harry and Ron run back down the long stone corridor towards the girls' bathroom. They hide as they see a monstrous shadow ahead of them. The troll is dragging a heavy club. Wiping her eyes Hermione comes out of the toilet. She sees two green legs as thick as great tree trunks. Terrified she stares up with horror at the troll's lumpy green body blocking the doorway. Its horrible head which looks like a squashed green potato is almost touching the high ceiling. Raising the club the troll moves ominously towards her. Hermione locks herself in a toilet. The troll swings the club and smashes it along the row of cubicles. The flimsy partitions fall on top of Hermione. The boys burst into the bathroom. As more cubicles are smashed to smithereens they throw broken pieces of wood at the troll. Ron hurls a length of metal pipe. Hermione hides under a row of wash basins. Terrified she cowers against the pipes as the troll smashes a sink off the wall. Harry pulls out his wand. He grabs the swinging club and scrambles up onto the troll's back. He tries to shake him off. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Harry hangs on with one hand. But before he can use his wand he accidentally rams it up the troll's nostril. The angry troll holds Harry upside down swinging him from side to side. Ron takes out his wand. The troll's club flies up into the air and hovers. Then it falls and hits the troll hard on its ugly green head. The troll drops Harry. He scuttles out of the way as the troll reels dizzily around then crashes heavily to the ground. As the dust settles Hermione creeps out from under the row of sinks. Water sprays out of a shattered pipe. She looks at the troll nervously. Harry pulls his wand out of the troll's nostril. He wipes it on his cloak. Ron smiles at Harry. Quirrell steps forward. He jumps as the troll gives a snot. At breakfast Snape appears. Harry notices that Snape is limping. Harry's snowy owl flies into the great hall skimming over their heads. It drops a long thin parcel. Harry catches it. They unwrap the brown paper to reveal a streamline broomstick with a highly polished handle. Stroking the white owl's feathers. Professor McGonagall smiles at Harry. Wearing leather gloves and scarlet and gold cloaks the Gryffindor. Quidditch team assemble in the player's tunnel.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: The tables are spread with a banquet of mouthwatering food cakes sweets pies and shiny red apples. Harry looks at the empty chair beside him. Suddenly Professor Quirrell bursts into the hall. Professor Dumbledore gets to his feet. Quirrell faints. As the students follow quickly into the Hall. Snape disappears through a side door. Harry and Ron run back down the long stone corridor towards the girls' bathroom. They hide as they see a monstrous shadow ahead of them. The troll is dragging a heavy club. Wiping her eyes Hermione comes out of the toilet. She sees two green legs as thick as great tree trunks. Terrified she stares up with horror at the troll's lumpy green body blocking the doorway. Its horrible head which looks like a squashed green potato is almost touching the high ceiling. Raising the club the troll moves ominously towards her. Hermione locks herself in a toilet. The troll swings the club and smashes it along the row of cubicles. The flimsy partitions fall on top of Hermione. The boys burst into the bathroom. As more cubicles are smashed to smithereens they throw broken pieces of wood at the troll. Ron hurls a length of metal pipe. Hermione hides under a row of wash basins. Terrified she cowers against the pipes as the troll smashes a sink off the wall. Harry pulls out his wand. He grabs the swinging club and scrambles up onto the troll's back. He tries to shake him off. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The chairs are covered with a pile of shimmering jewels, pebbles, feathers, rocks, and shiny blue marbles. Linda glances at the occupied couch beside her. Abruptly, Commander Smith sneaks into the cavern. Commander Rogers rises from his seat. Smith stumbles. As the teachers rush slowly into the Cave, Jenkins vanishes through a trapdoor. Linda and Jack sprint up the narrow sandy pathway towards the boys' pantry. They crouch as they notice a gigantic silhouette behind them. The ogre is dragging a light spear. Patting her forehead, Alice exits the cupboard. She notices three purple arms as thin as slender vines. Petrified, she gazes down with awe at the ogre's smooth, purple chest blocking the passageway. Its tiny mouth, which resembles a flattened, purple berry, is nearly brushing the low rafters. Lowering the spear, the ogre steps peacefully towards her. Alice seals herself in a cupboard. The ogre twirls the spear and taps it across the line of lockers. The sturdy enclosures tumble over Alice. The girls burst into the pantry. As fewer lockers are tapped to ruins, they fling shattered shards of glass at the ogre. Jack pitches a bundle of rubber bands. Alice cowers behind a line of dish racks. Petrified, she cringes against the racks as the ogre taps a pan off the shelf. Linda extracts her brush. She seizes the dangling spear and climbs down onto the ogre's chest. She attempts to push him aside. Linda clings on with one foot. But before she can wield her brush, she mistakenly thrusts it into the ogre's ear. The amused ogre flips Linda sideways, swinging her up and down. Jack lifts his brush. The ogre's spear tumbles down into the floor and drifts. Then, it lands and taps the ogre lightly on its smooth, purple mouth. The ogre releases Linda. She shuffles into the clearing, as the ogre pivots gracefully around then settles gently to the ground. As the breeze rises, Alice sneaks out from under the line of pots. Steam puffs out of a repaired vent. She peers at the ogre calmly. Linda extracts her brush from the ogre's ear. She cleans it on her jacket. Jack frowns at Linda. Smith strolls backward. He dances as the ogre gives a sneeze. At lunch, Jenkins vanishes. Linda observes that Jenkins is sprinting. Linda's black cat prowls into the vast cave swooping under their arms. It places a wide flat basket. Linda kicks it. They fold the glossy plastic, to uncover a clunky skateboard with a roughly carved shaft. Petting the black cat's whiskers, Commander Michaels frowns at Linda. Wearing wool hats and purple and black coats, the Leopard Racing squad disband in the observer's hall.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The tables are laden with delicious food at Hogwarts. Harry notices an empty chair when Professor Quirrell rushes in, causing chaos. As Snape exits discreetly, Harry and Ron dash to the girl's bathroom. They spot a massive troll wielding a club. Hermione, emerging from the toilet, is horrified by the menacing creature. She locks herself in a stall as the troll attacks. Harry and Ron intervene, throwing debris to distract it. Harry climbs the troll and unintentionally shoves his wand into its nostril. Ron uses his wand to levitate the club, which falls on the troll, knocking it out and saving Harry. As Hermione emerges, water sprays from broken pipes. Quirrell is shocked when the troll sneezes. Later, at breakfast, Snape limps in, and Harry's owl delivers a broomstick, prompting Professor McGonagall to smile approvingly. The Gryffindor Quidditch team gathers, ready for action.
